title: London Real/David Icke, Investigation Update
description:
This is a short update to the recent 'David Icke & London Real, an Investigation': https://youtu.be/hDM1wTGOjOw

The livestream of David Icke on the London Real platform happened on Sunday 3rd. This is an update on what happened before and after the livestream, focusing on Brian Rose of London Real, and the bigger issues that it brings up.

References in this film include:

Picture of the White Collar Factory: https://www.derwentlondon.com/properties/white-collar-factory

The Internet of Beefs, Venkatesh Rao: https://www.ribbonfarm.com/2020/01/16/the-internet-of-beefs/

Tech vs Human, Douglas Rushkoff: https://youtu.be/koE-ZQia15E

War on Sensemaking, Daniel Schmachtenberger: https://youtu.be/7LqaotiGWjQ

Deep Code, Jordan (Green)Hall: https://youtu.be/_j3cCrpXERg
